mott

mott

Build stuff faster.

github

start

mkdir myapp && npm install -g mott && mott

Have a look at the generated code in `mott.js`

This site is built using mott.

cookbook

The cookbook ties everything together. Because you could have multiple apps running at once, the cookbook handles making a single view of the world for for you.
